title: Add transplant re-sync and drift detection workflow
description: Add repeatable process/script/docs to re-sync from pi_agent_rust and detect inventory/hash drift.

title: Implement doctor command for environment diagnostics
Restore transplant snapshot files under transplant/pi_agent_rust
description: Materialize the documented transplant snapshot inventory so manifest, hash lockfile, and drift detection have real inputs.

title: Add transplant re-sync + drift detection workflow
description: Document and implement a reproducible workflow for re-syncing transplanted assets from upstream pi_agent_rust and detecting drift against manifest/lockfile.

title: Run baseline workspace checks via rch offload
description: Use rch exec for cargo fmt/check/clippy to establish baseline health without local CPU contention.

title: Backfill beads graph from TODO_ULTRA_DETAILED
description: Create initial actionable beads from docs/TODO_ULTRA_DETAILED.md and wire dependencies for parallel execution.

title: Bootstrap clap CLI surface for franken-node
description: Replace bootstrap print-only main with clap-powered command routing. Implement initial `run` command that evaluates JavaScript via HybridRouter and a `doctor` command that validates extension-host snapshot metadata availability.
acceptance_criteria: 1) CLI subcommands parse and dispatch cleanly. 2) `franken-node run` accepts script/eval input and executes through HybridRouter. 3) `franken-node doctor` reports extension-host snapshot path/state. 4) Build and lint pass.

title: Add explicit franken_node product charter document
description: Create an explicit product charter in docs that aligns franken_node scope, split-governance boundaries, and non-negotiable constraints with PLAN_TO_CREATE_FRANKEN_NODE.md and franken_engine split contract.

title: Add transplant hash lockfile for tamper detection
description: Hash each transplanted file and persist deterministic lockfile with provenance metadata.
close_reason: Duplicate scope; superseded by bd-7rt currently in progress

title: Implement init command with profile bootstrapping
Build CLI scaffold with clap for franken-node binary
close_reason: CLI scaffold implemented: 10 top-level commands (init, run, migrate, verify, trust, fleet, incident, registry, bench, doctor) with full argument parsing via clap derive. All subcommands match README CLI reference. Compiles clean, clippy clean, fmt clean.

title: Implement CLI scaffold for franken-node runtime commands
description: Create a clap-based command surface in crates/franken-node with core subcommands (init, run, migrate, verify, trust, incident, doctor) mapped to explicit handlers and deterministic output stubs. Keep engine bootstrap path available and test argument parsing.
notes: Released due to active reservation conflict with JadeHollow on main.rs and crate Cargo.toml; reassigned for non-overlapping execution.

title: Generate transplant hash lockfile for tamper detection
description: Create a deterministic lockfile containing cryptographic hashes for transplanted files and wire docs/process for integrity verification.

title: Implement configuration system (franken_node.toml) with profile support
Implement franken-node CLI scaffold aligned with README command families
description: Introduce command surface skeleton (init/migrate/verify/trust/incident/fleet/doctor) to reduce README-implementation mismatch.
